extendedInfo.description: All the features of GPS Test plus:-â WAYPOINT NAVIGATIONâ HEAD UP DISPLAYâ DIGITAL FONTS (Great in the car)Now shows symbols for GLONASS satellites The GPS Test Plus app for Android is a utility that shows GPS information read from your phones internal GPS. Will support GLONASS phones.The navigation functions can replace your 'Car Finder' app and also be used for Geocaching. It records the last twelve saved locations, so you can navigate a simple route as well.If you like this app, please like GPS Test on Facebook: -http://www.facebook.com/GpsTestGPS Test Plus has five screens full of information: -1) GPS signal (SNR) bar chart, showing the signal strength for each satellite, as well as the accuracy and status of the GPS.2) Satellite positions in the sky (skyview), shown on a rotating compass.3) Your current location on the earth shown as text and on a world map. The current position of the sun and the day/night transition curve is also shown.4) Your current speed, heading and altitude shown as text or as dials.5) The current time read from the GPS and the local time in your current timezone, as well as the sunrise and sunset times at your location.Useful for navigation or geocaching. Supported Coordinate Grids:-OSGB, UTM, MGRS, USNG, CH1903, Maidenhead.Supported Datums:-WGS84, NAD83, NAD27, ED50, AGD66, AGD84, SAD69All the features of GPS Test, plus:-* Speedometer, Altimeter and Compass dials.* Seven segment display font.* Dot matrix display font.* HUD display mode for windscreens.(The display is mirrored so that it shows the right way round when the phone is placed on a car's dash and the reflection is viewed in the windscreen).* Share location.The app has several colour schemes, which could be used to match other instrumentation, used along side the app. It has a "night mode" colour scheme as well.Works on Honeycomb O/S and large screen tablets.Blog for GPSTest http://gpstestapp.blogspot.com/

reviews.title: Wonderful app
reviews.comment: Simple to use, works perfectly, also really interesting to find out more about GPS. I bought the upgrade immediately.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app and good price
reviews.comment: I\'ve used the free version for some while, and found it very easy to use, very useful, then I saw the paid version and all its extra features, and had to get the plus version. I recommend it for hiker enthusiasts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GPS Test Plus
reviews.comment: Very good app. Just wish you had the ability to measure accumulative distance travelled instead of distace from last waypoint. I would use this app a lot more while horseback riding in the mountains if it did
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a brilliant app, Heading indicator is 100% accurate and unafected by outside magnetic influences when moving. FANTASTIC VALUE.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very cool app.
reviews.comment: I got this app when I saw the satilight and signal pages, it looks just like my Garman and that I could leave waypoints..all without a cell signal
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great, but can not manage waypoints
reviews.comment: This app does not let me delete waypoints individually. Beside that it saves only the 12 last ones. If you have already saved 12 and want to save the 13th one, your first data will be deleted, even if it is the most important for you. Unfortunately I have to use a simpler free app which handles the stored waypoints correctly, without such limits.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very versatile
reviews.comment: Better than any other similar apps out there. Love the navigation, but wish it could allow more waypoint to be saved, i.e. a better waypoint management system (currently max at 12). Hope to see in future release the ability to search by place name/address, etc. in addition to keying in the gps coordinates. 5 stars nevertheless.
reviews.author: Eddie Teo

reviews.title: Works great and looks great
reviews.comment: Everything works perfectly all the time and looks great. Detailed information gives nice insight.  Personally I don\'t use the Plus-features so the free version was good enough but I bought the Plus version to sponsor development.
reviews.author: Job Bolle

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: Fantastic......along with Google nav and Navionics marine charts I have the ultimate pocket GPS
reviews.author: walter grabinsky

reviews.title: Get grid
reviews.comment: I use mgrs to find my location, but i would like to mark my destination by grid reference. That is the only down side, awsome app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A Superb utility App
reviews.comment: This is the most useful app for the GPS. It locks the signal in just a few seconds. Great work!
reviews.author: Donald Kuok

reviews.title: Waypoint What Navigation?
reviews.comment: Allows you to save your last 12 locations but what for? Help file doesn\'t explain how to use them for navigation. Other than that it\'s a fine app.
reviews.author: Kein Gan

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: I use this enough to wonder about some of the design choices.  I would like to be able to see both heading and speed at the same time, but heading is on the Navigate screen and speed is on the Test screen.  I also would like to be able to delete some locations from my History screen.  There are 12 slots for saving locations, but the only delete option is to wipe out all 12 rather than just one or two.  I think the only way to see altitude is to click on the Save Location (although you can cancel without saving).  I also use GPS Essentials which is more customizable but the interface isn\'t as pretty.
reviews.author: Thomas O\'Neil

reviews.title: Support needs improvement but works good.
reviews.comment: I would have given it 5 stars if not for the questionable support.  Must be installed to see instructions for use and takes multiple emails for support before any response is received.  Otherwise, app works wonderfully well on my OptimusG, no hic-ups and contrary to some comments does not appear to affect battery when app is closed.  Easy UI and the most important usuable GPS features are included with the plus version.  Really enjoy having such a simple yet effective GPS software on my phone - will come in very handy indeed.  Hopefully characteristics do not change for the worse with future upgrades.  Great product!
reviews.author: Marco Alessandrini

reviews.title: The best GPS data app I\'ve used so far!
reviews.comment: Great app for phones or tablets. Accurate data. Nice color and font options. Interesting heads up display mode for driving (I don\'t need it, but others might find it useful). I especially like the inverted white color option. This is a great looking GPS app, plus it is responsive and fast. I was using GPS Essentials before, which is nice. But this one is worth the price. Definitely get it if you have a tablet with GPS!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing Simple Features
reviews.comment: This can be a great app... its missing very simple features (should be very easy for the developer to code). The only worthy enhancement over free GPS Test is \"Marking a waypoint\". Few things that the developer must add are 1. Add a waypoint (though this can be accomplished by marking a waypoint and editing it.. but it makes you think) 2. Capability to store more than JUST 12 waypoints. 3. Routing (Sewing waypoints together) 4. Capability to change Position Format in Navigate.  All these enhancements should be easy as other complex hardword is done just need to focus more on usefulness. Not sure why the deveoper missed them in the first place.  No more than 2 stars..:(
reviews.author: Ajeet Sahu

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Seems no good for use with paper maps with UTM grid.  Yes you can set the Grid format to UTM for the main display, but when you go to mark your current position the Lat / Long is still displayed in decimal degrees.  This means you can\'t edit that position to represent, say, a particular mountain pass then navigate to it.  Not even in the paid for version. So its OK as a fun toy but for serious backcountry navigation, forget it.
reviews.author: Mike Hart

reviews.title: Great app but GPS slow
reviews.comment: I purchased this app for full functionality and it generally works as expected. My  concern is the time it takes to get the current location. My car GPS gets the location almost instantaneously, this app takes minutes and occasionaly it fails, e.g. on an island or at sea. It could be due to a limitation related to my device (Nexus 4) but I doubt it because I can see the app appears to detect up to 10 satellites in the first few seconds upon launch and then it takes a long time to compute the location.
reviews.author: Pegasone CA

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app for seeing the raw information from the gps, including coordinates,  number of satellites, accuracy etc. My only wish is that I could enter waypoints in the same system as the display (i.e. If i have utm displayed, i want to be able to enter a waypoint in utm not just decimal degrees which is next to useless!!)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very informative and useful
reviews.comment: I started out just looking for GPS coordinates, but was excited to find not only every piece of GPS info I wanted, but more features that I didn\'t expect. The HUD speedometer is fabulous!
reviews.author: A Google User
